DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if C-Reactive Protein levels are predictive for complications post transplant.
DOC.brief_title: C-Reactive Protein as a Predictor of Stem Cell Transplant Complications
DOC.criteria: Age 6 months to 20 years Patient undergoing a stem cell transplant (allogeneic, syngeneic, or autologous) at Childrens' Memorial Hospital IRB approved informed consent (and assent for children age 1217)
